Class MouseEngineEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • dillon.gameAPI.event.EEvent

  • public class MouseEngineEvent
extends EEvent
    Fires when a mouse event occurs. Metadata: mode, button, and point

    Dillon - Github dg092099
